events.name: I/O Extended 2018 GDG Craiova Dev News
events.description:
Google I/O Extended by GDG Craiova

Google I/O is an annual developer conference held by Google that brings together developers from around the globe for talks, hands-on learning with Google experts, and a first look at Google’s latest developer products. This year’s developer festival will be held May 8-10 at the Shoreline Amphitheatre in Mountain View, CA and we are extremely excited to host a GOOGLE I/O EXTENDED event here in Craiova

I/O Extended events help developers from around the world take part in the I/O experience.

We're going to discuss the latest news and releases from this year.

Agenda
TBD

This event is free.
events.how_to_find_us: Vizavi de Teatrul National, cum veniti dinspre Hotel Helin Central, cu 15 metri pana in Spartan, prin gangul de langa fostul Lux Premier, prima pe stanga, la etaj, urmariti indicatoarele cu Scoala Informala

events.name: Next '18 Extended - Craiova
events.description:
Google Cloud Next is the I/O equivalent for enterprise developers, customers, and other industry partners.

Join us for this year's Next Extended event, where we'll bring together cloud enthusiasts and the developer community to be a part of the Next '18 experience.

This year we will be diving deep into cloud with technical keynotes, a hands-on TOPIC (Kubernetes, ML, or Google Cloud Certification) codelab and specialized speakers.

As an attendee, you'll not only be a part of our vibrant cloud community but also receive free access to Qwiklabs (a $55+ value)!
Select your preference here:
https://www.meetup.com/gdg-craiova/polls/1266964/

Don't forget to bring a laptop (PC, Mac, or Chromebook) and get ready for the best Next Extended yet!

Make sure to RSVP to receive upcoming information about this event and visit https://cloudnext.withgoogle.com/ to learn more about Google Cloud Next '18.

Agenda
19:00 - 21:00 Dive into the world of Docker and Kubernetes

This event is free.

PS NU UITATI SA VENITI CU LAPTOPUL PERSONAL

events.name: Firebase - hot sauce for your app

venue.name: The Ramada Plaza Hotel, Henri Coanda meeting room

events.description:
This meetup is a joined forces meetup between GDG Craiova and Softelligence Engineering Craiova - our partener for this event.

From the GDG Craiova part, we have a very special guest who works together with the Firebase team in Canada, at Google. His name is Alex Sandu Astrum and he will introduce us into the Firebase world.

From our partner and sponsor for this event, Softelligence Engineering,
there will be a very interesting presentation related to automated testing for web application held by Mihai Vladu & Cătălin Ursu.

Please, don't RSVP with yes if you don't plan to join this meetup.
(Va rugam sa nu raspundeti cu Da daca nu planuiti sa veniti la acest eveniment). We have limited seats number.

In order to join our meetup, please complete the next form:
https://goo.gl/forms/1GeunzvzEziIMzd23

Agenda:
18:00 - 18:30 - Registration
18:30 - 19:45 - Alex Sandu Astrum(Google) - Firebase - hot sauce for your app
19:45 - 20:30 - Mihai Vladu & Cătălin Ursu(Softelligence) - Automated testing for web applications
20:30 - 20:55 Community panel: Cristian Dascălu, vlogger
20:55 - 21:10 Networking
Location:
- Hotel Ramada, Henri Coanda meeting room

Presentations:
1) Firebase - hot sauce for your app

Briefing:
We'll discover the best Firebase has to offer to web developers. We'll talk about well known & loved BaaS products, like Firestore & Cloud Functions, as well as the new cool integrations Firebase released this year.

2) Automated testing for web applications

Briefing:
A walkthrough on the process of transforming business requirements into validated behavior expectations using a continuous test management platform. The presentation will showcase the use of web tools based on test cases defined in Gherkin language for automation testing of a web application. We will be using Hiptest as the test management platform and Cucumber JS to transform data in order to be automated in Nightwatch JS framework, the test runs will be available in a cross-browser cloud environment named Saucelabs.

About Speakers:

Alex is a Software Engineer with 10+ years of web/mobile development experience, currently working at Google in Canada. He has been working also for some top software companies in Bucharest. He is enjoying Firebase, Angular & good design.
Outside work, he loves games, surfing & EDM.

Mihai is a software engineer with a Master's degree in Computer Engineering and part of Softelligence Engineering’s team. He has always worked as a fullstack developer on various web applications and loves diving into new technologies and tools whenever he has some spare time. When not coding, he enjoys playing football, skiing or fishing.

Catalin is a software QA engineer and a member of the Softelligence Engineering team. With more than 6 years’ experience in QA, Catalin's desire to innovate is steered through implementing QA best practices and being involved on various products and domains, from broadcasting management systems to e-learning applications. In his spare time he likes playing football, going to the gym, skiing and traveling.
events.how_to_find_us: Hotel Ramada is located very close to the city center at the crossroads of Calea Bucuresti with Stefan cel Mare street.

events.name: Google HashCode 2019 Contest

venue.name: Faculty of Automation, Computers and Electronics

events.description:
Joi, 28 februarie 2019, începând cu ora 19:00, se va desfășura competiția online Google Hash Code, in cadrul Facultății de Automatică, Calculatoare şi Electronică, sala S7A ( turn, etajul 7)

Pentru a putea participa este necesar să faci parte dintr-o echipă. Înregistrarea individuală a fiecăruia dintre cei 2-4 membri ai unei echipe este deschisă până la data de 25 februarie 2019 ora 12:00 CET pe site-ul: https://codingcompetitions.withgoogle.com/hashcode

Hash Code este o competiție globală de programare între toate echipele înscrise în concurs, organizată anul acesta pentru a 6-a oară de către Google, în două etape:
- etapa de calificare online se va desfășura în ziua de 28 februarie 2019, în intervalul orar 19:00 – 23:00,in cadrul Facultății de Automatică, Calculatoare şi Electronică (revenim cu detalii legate de sală)
- etapa finală se va desfășura în ziua de 27 aprilie 2019, la sediul Google din Dublin.

Cine poate participa?
Sunt așteptați să participe studenți (de orice nivel) și / sau profesioniști în domeniul IT sau un domeniu corelat (Informatică, Informatică Economică, Matematică, Automatizări și Calculatoare, etc.)

Unde mă înregistrez?
Înregistrarea oficială pe site-ul https://codingcompetitions.withgoogle.com/hashcode este obligatorie pentru cei ce doresc să participe. De asemenea, vă rugăm să trimiteți un email la [masked] în caz că doriți să participați dar nu aveţi echipă, pentru a putea asigura locuri pentru toți participanții.

Pentru mai multe detalii despre eveniment urmăriți pagina noastră de Facebook (GDG Craiova - https://www.facebook.com/gdg.craiova/), contactați organizatorii la adresa de email [masked] sau urmăriți pagina oficială https://codingcompetitions.withgoogle.com/hashcode

group_profile.intro: I am a passionate Front-end developer at Softelligence Engineering and also a trainer at Informal School of IT(Scoala Informala de IT), having more than fifteen years of experience in the IT domain.
I'm a Front-end developer at iQuest. I help building complex applications using the latest and greatest in what JavaScript has to offer.
